item.title: Linux Server, Reset MySQL Password
item.description:
I had an idle Tencent Cloud server that was expiring at the end of the year and I hadn’t planned to renew it. So, I decided to deploy a MySQL database for development purposes. When reinstalling the system, I wanted to save time and chose a third-party image provided by Tencent Cloud, which already had MySQL installed. I thought the system should include a Readme file or similar documentation explaining the password and deployment path.

The Tencent Cloud server reinstalled very quickly, taking about a minute. Once logged in, systemctl status mysql showed that the service was running. I started searching for the password but couldn’t find it anywhere, and I began to panic.

Then, I thought, since I had already accessed the server with root privileges, there must be a way to reset the password. I searched through documentation and found a forum post on Alibaba Cloud’s forum, continuing to tinker.

Reset Password

Edit the configuration file vim /etc/my.cnf, adding the following configuration to the mysqld node: skip-grant-tables, then execute the command to restart the database: systemctl restart mysql.

Next, log in directly to the data using mysql, and then proceed with normal operations. To reset the root user password and enable allowing remote login, revert the modified configuration file, restart the database, and you’re done.

References

  • https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/42520.html

item.title: nights-naming-art
item.description:
• In the vast system of Chinese characters, the character “命” (life/fate) is unique; there isn’t even a single homophone. Perhaps this subtly suggests that each person’s life has only one opportunity, cannot be replicated, and cannot be relived.

During leisure time, I browsed the rankings on Qidian Chinese Net, and “The Nomenclature of Nights” consistently topped the charts with over two million monthly votes, a significant gap from the second-place ranking. Previously, I had primarily read works by well-known authors like Tang Jia San Shao and Ergen; this time, I decided to try a new author’s work to experience a different reading sensation.

As of early August, “The Nomenclature of Nights” had amassed two million monthly votes, while the second-place ranking stood at only eight hundred thousand – a staggering disparity that left me speechless.

I realize my knowledge is limited and I lack the ability to critically evaluate the author’s writing style. However, after reading through over a dozen chapters, the book’s plot is tightly paced and intricately linked, captivating readers and earning such high monthly votes – it’s truly well-deserved.

Interestingly, just like the character “ming” (life/fate), the character “si” (death) also doesn’t have any homophones in Chinese characters; does this perhaps also contain a similarly unique and irreplaceable depth of meaning regarding the end of life?

item.title: A Brief Overview of Automated Testing
item.description:
The investment in testing for financial trading systems far exceeds that of other systems, with cumbersome test steps repeatedly executed and a low ROI. As projects and personnel change, uncontrollable factors inevitably introduce more issues; a common scenario involves modifying a field output from Interface A, which then impacts the results of Interface B. With each release, risk accumulates.

Theoretical Knowledge

  • How to Measure the Value of Automation? An automation testing ROI = (Manual Execution Time) * (Number of Runs) / (Development Cost + Maintenance Cost)
  • Which Features Should Be Automated? Frequently used features that are unlikely to change. Writing automated test code for this type of interface yields the highest returns.
  • Why Choose This Timing to Drive Automation Testing? Not appropriate near project launch – distant water doesn’t quench immediate thirst; automation is a long-term return model. Most suitable when the project is already in production environment and within a stable release cycle.

Framework Selection

Given the task of automation testing without prior practical experience, a typical starting point is to open a search engine and find tools and frameworks that can be used with the current system’s technology stack, review the user manuals, and get started. If you can immediately find a suitable tool, congratulations, perfect start!

Let me preface this by saying I might be wrong. After reviewing relevant materials, it’s not about whether it doesn’t exist; rather, the frameworks themselves are too complex and consume excessive resources. For beginners, what’s needed is something small, streamlined, and concise. Consulting with colleagues in the testing group led to the suggestion of a Python self-built framework – essentially, wrapping existing unit testing frameworks into an automated testing framework.

Referencing the design thinking for this project: https://github.com/wintests/pytestDemo

Why Use a Framework?

Services have multiple different deployment environments – development, testing, and live testing. The purpose of a framework is to act as an abstraction layer, separating test cases and data. This allows for configuring different case data based on the specific environment configuration, and also supports shared data.

The core logic is focused on increasing the utilization of automation. When scenarios become more complex, the data between different environments is completely unrelated – there’s no connection whatsoever. Simply add a label tag when defining case data to specify the supported environment.

References

Best Value Automation Testing

item.title: Visual Studio Compilation Character Set [Converted]
item.description:
C++ cross-platform development. Commonly encountered on Chinese operating systems: error C2001: constant contains a newline character

Visual Studio

cmake organizes project compilation scripts, generating a temporary solution under the windows system for development. The reason for cross-platform compatibility is that the file encoding is chosen as utf-8.

Reference materials thoroughly explained the causes of the problem from first principles.

Regarding encoding, MSVC has dedicated compilation options /source-charset and /execution-charset. The former indicates the encoding of the file itself, and the latter indicates what encoding the byte sequence within the compiled character array is. Encoding issues can generally be solved using these two options.

For example, the windows cmd console defaults to displaying gbk encoding, but since the code file itself is utf-8, and it’s not convenient to directly change it to gbk due to cross-platform considerations, we wouldn’t include writing conversion code for different platforms here. On Win10, you can set these two compilation options to /source-charset:utf-8 /execution-charset:gbk, indicating that the compiler should read in with UTF-8 encoding and then convert it to GBK for storage within the array. This allows direct use of printf to display Chinese characters normally in the cmd console.

CMake for Visual Studio Setup

item.title: Pelosi Visits Taiwan
item.description:
Don’t know politics, don’t make comments, record this “carnival” on the internet.

Musings

The Tangshan Assault Incident and the Primary School Textbook Cultural Invasion Incident – I wonder how many people even remember them anymore. Wiki Overview

Nancy Pelosi’s visit to Taiwan in 2022, also known as the Pelosi visit to Taiwan, refers to U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi’s 2022 trip to Asia, specifically her itinerary including a visit to Taiwan.

Due to the U.S. House Speaker being considered the third-highest official in the United States and plans to visit Taiwan, the date was approaching the Chinese People’s Liberation Army’s (PLA) Founding Day on August 1st, and long-term it was approaching the Communist Party of China’s Twentieth National Congress, the 2022 U.S. elections, and the 2022 Republic of China local elections. The Eastern Theater Command and the Southern Theater Command respectively conducted large-scale live ammunition exercises in the East Sea and South China Sea. On the U.S. side, the Ronald Reagan aircraft carrier strike group arrived near the Taiwan Strait to guard against Pelosi’s possible visit to Taiwan, and dispatched several batches of reconnaissance aircraft and aerial refueling tankers to standby at the US Kadena Air Force Base. Chinese President Xi Jinping and U.S. President Joe Biden had a video meeting prior to the visit, which covered the issue of Taiwan. Taiwanese and international media revealed that Speaker Pelosi and the House of Representatives delegation would arrive at Songshan Airport in Taipei on the 2nd, stay overnight, and meet with Taiwan’s Presidential Office leader Tsai Ing-wen and other senior government officials on the 3rd.

08-11

item.title: Shanghai Fen Yong Guo (Shun Duck Soup Pot) Lockdown
item.description:
The leadership team insisted for two days that Shanghai wouldn’t be locked down, that Shanghai was important. But in the end, facing the reality or to preserve their own prestige, they came up with a strategy of sealing off the area across the Huangpu River first, followed by sealing off the riverbank on this side.

Lockdown

Growing up, I experienced the SARS epidemic, and I don’t have many memories of it. Later, when I saw related materials, it ended because its incubation period was short and there wasn’t a nationwide spread yet. I remember being in primary school back then, and we would finish school very early every day. There was always the smell of disinfectant hanging in the air in the classrooms.

Since the end of 2019, the COVID-19 pandemic has been going on for almost three years. People working abroad have become accustomed to it, wearing masks when they need to. The Shanghai outbreak has repeatedly fluctuated, originating from Hong Kong and then spreading across the border to Shenzhen, and here in Shanghai, it was due to a wave of imported cases from Hong Kong. The official announcement stated that the spread of the epidemic was caused by inadequate protection measures at the quarantine hotels. Although the mutated virus had reduced its toxicity, its transmission speed had increased, facilitated by the spread through hotel ventilation systems.

Lockdown

As you can all see from the results, the new cases have already exceeded 20,000, leaving us with no choice but to implement a lockdown. Notably, it didn’t use the word “lockdown” externally, as it had previously stated in a press conference that Shanghai did not need a lockdown, which was intended to preserve its last shred of face.

Grocery Shopping

The delivery industry is a new emerging sector driven by the internet. The core of it relies on someone delivering groceries for you, right? However, due to widespread lockdowns in many areas during the pandemic, merchants could operate but no one was available to deliver, which removed the final link in the chain. People outside of this situation may not fully understand – how could a cosmopolitan metropolis like Shanghai, with its large population, have everyone flocking to buy groceries together? In reality, it’s easy to see that most people are also migrant workers who come from other places to work and live in rented apartments, typically eating at company canteens or restaurants, rarely cooking at home. When this route becomes blocked, those with the means will start buying groceries. Because this lockdown announcement was not made in advance, people didn’t have much food or vegetables stored up as a daily reserve.

Industry

All of us are working in the IT industry. I experienced the impact of the pandemic, getting a taste of remote work. Back in 2019, I stayed at home for almost a month, changing my train tickets back and forth ten times, with no certainty about when I would be able to return to Shenzhen. I can’t even imagine how those people in the catering, tourism, or many service industries have been getting by these past few years.

item.title: When you want to make money
item.description:
Ordinary people are social animals, that’s right – you are an individual, but also a bipedal animal, with strong social attributes; you have feelings of inferiority and vanity, and society is constantly changing and eroding your everydayness. We don’t discuss those great figures, those who willingly burn themselves for society or the nation.

My Current Situation

Looking at average wages or my hometown’s salaries, my current income is significantly above the average – what more could I possibly want?

Once you earn one million, you start thinking about earning one hundred million; once you earn one hundred million, you start thinking about earning a billion. This is natural for ordinary people; we must face our inner selves.

My Current Situation

What’s red are the more relaxed ways to make money: short videos. Everyone knows it’s not simple to enter an industry. What you see is short video content, but what you don’t see is the behind-the-scenes work of filming and copywriting. But everyone has their own dream – I’m suited for that industry, I was born to be in it.

Getting Started

I’ve watched so many videos. If you analyze a lot of the shots with your own brain, you can clearly see professional editing techniques and strong cinematic elements. Basically, some of them are from people who have formal training – film school graduates, for example. Of course, there’s also the logic of grassroots success, but that doesn’t apply to most people, does it? On TikTok, you’ll also find many videos teaching you how to make videos. At this point, people are starting to wake up. If they could really make money, why would they teach others how to do it instead of doing it themselves?

Anti-Human Recommendation Algorithms

Previously, the Douyin algorithm would recommend movie clips and anime clips while I was scrolling. It felt surprisingly engaging, to the point where you’d start to find it interesting yourself. However, when I looked into how Douyin makes money, it started recommending various tutorial videos non-stop, flooding my entire recommendation stream. As someone who also works in the IT industry, this made me feel like the algorithm “big brothers” were having a bit of a problem – you’re essentially suggesting this to me, are you thinking I’m stupid or are you stupid? The key thing is that it keeps finding new ways to recommend videos on how to make money with Douyin, from different angles and across various types. It’s like they’re constantly adapting. This draft was written at 3 AM, and frankly, I didn’t want to write it in the first place. I started wondering how long this business model could last – how much time can you siphon away from people?

Finding Clarity

When teaching people how to do things, presenting a set of rules for them and then being unable to control yourself when doing it is ridiculous. As I’m not a purely technical blog writer, I haven’t published some things domestically, so here I casually rant. If one day I get banned, that can only be said to move somewhere else. I can’t say I haven’t done anything with Douyin – at least now it actively cooperates in the dissemination of real-time news and the propaganda of national policies, because in our country, you can’t defy the Communist Party, right?

Now think back to when you were studying. When you truly can’t find the meaning of life, quietly reading a book is enough. In this era, how many people can still quiet themselves down and quietly read books?

Epilogue

I also want to thank the progress of science and technology. If you’re seeing this line, you’ll realize that the entire manuscript is very colloquial. And I really just kept writing and writing it. The input method I usually used was Sogou Input Method, which I’d been using for about seven or eight years. However, when it came to voice input, it had to be said that Xunfei was more professional.

In 2022, the article number was changed to 002. Why did it have two zeros? There’s a dream – this year I wanted to break the hundred articles, which is just a dream, right? It’s not really articles; it’s more like records. I reflect on myself every day, and you must be able to think of some things, right?

item.title: Adding a code copy button – seemingly simple things
item.description:
Spent four hours trying to figure this out, and when I saw the sentence, it was hilarious. How could it have taken so long? When I finally looked at the time, it was only three hours.

This was the first draft of the year 2022, and it wasn’t complicated – exactly as the title said. (At that time, I was still very young), I thought simply copying 作业 would be enough, putting it in my favorites folder, and dragging it out for over a month before finally remembering the task.

When migrating to hugo, I always felt that the plugins were too few, couldn’t copy code, which made copying notes from Evernote to the blog very cumbersome, seriously hindering my motivation for writing a casual blog.

Foreword

First, carefully read the original author’s draft, read it through completely and flip through the author’s introduction. Wow, I encountered a big shot – Tsinghua University undergraduate, has been exposed to computers early on. Let’s see, just a facade, let’s take a look at this blog first, completely forgot what he was supposed to do. Also browse the author’s Github repository, this modified ‘even’ theme is much more beautiful than now and has many new features, let’s get started, first merge the related code into the current one.

New Features: View Article History, Associate Submission Records

The effect is still good, and you can experience it by dragging it to the end of the article.

Before taking action, I didn’t carefully examine the author’s original repository history, assuming a simple merge would fix everything. In the end, I merged a huge amount of code with numerous conflicts and N times of mindless overwriting – all of which were frontend and rendering template codes. I took the version I needed as the standard.

Repository address: https://github.com/TianlongXiang/hugo-theme-even

A Chinese pitfall: if git doesn’t adjust this parameter, the generated one won’t get the current article’s commit hash, causing the history link generation to fail. When generating the complete historical record of the article, you also need to modify the automatic integration script and remember to pull the entire historical record of the current repository.

  • [feat: Attempt to pull the full GitHub repository to dynamically update the last modification record of the article](https://github.com/

New Features: View Article History, Associate Submission Records

  • chore: Path contains Chinese, Hugo GitInfo needs to enable this setting

Style Adjustments

  • Adjust website content width, the previous design was suitable for both mobile and desktop devices; in reality, no one actually viewed it on their phones, and I personally view it on my computer.
  • The directory bar supports automatic expansion/collapse.

Body

Referenced the ouuan code records for half an hour and still couldn’t quite understand how to increase the copy button.

Time travel, a month later, it came back to this matter again

Body

Since I didn’t understand this assignment, I switched to copying from another one – it’s always easier to understand when you copy. The results of my searches were surprisingly helpful; a post on the official hugo forum mentioned how to add a copy button. Going there to check, the logic was clear. It was baffling until I returned to the site and saw that the styling generated by even differed from the description in the documentation – this part was quite complicated. I’m just going to record it simply.

Because I don’t really understand front-end development, when I don’t know something, I open my browser’s “Inspect” tool and analyze the code, relying on the style information on the right side to slowly figure out the logic; I didn’t understand JavaScript, so I added some logs to the console. There were many things I didn’t understand at first. Taking a deep breath and carefully sorting through and breaking down the logic, you can always find a solution.

    1. The pre node has multiple instances; here it refers to a single code block, which the theme rendered with line numbers, resulting in two copies when the copy button is used.
  2. I wanted to disable the theme’s built-in code highlighting, but I’m unfamiliar with these theme settings.
  3. I consulted the hugo website for resources and read a bit, learning that there’s a markup setting to control code highlighting.
  4. Adjusting the configuration file didn’t work; the rendering was different from what I expected.
  5. I discovered this set of settings pygmentsOptions and continued to consult documentation, adjusting the settings, starting by removing line numbers.
  6. I configured a custom css stylesheet and a custom js script.

Body

  1. Since I’ve been doing so much, my brain suddenly thought of a color palette I saw recently that looked good, and changed the button styles: Let’s go with Chinese-style sky blue.
ouuan spent four hours on this, and when I saw that sentence, I even thought it was funny. How could it take so long? When I looked at the time, it was only three hours.

item.title: What we have been seeking throughout our lives is…
item.description:
Wang Yi-zi said: Human relationships, spanning a lifetime of mutual support and dependence, may be held within one’s embrace, understood in the confines of one room; or they may arise from entrusted messages, dissolving into the vastness beyond.

  • In a lifetime, like a fleeting flower. Like grass and trees blossoming and withering, like the rising and setting of the sun and moon.
  • Yet, in this life, desires are numerous.
  • As a child, I lay under lotus plants and hemp in the stream, busy catching the east wind to fly kites, chasing yellow butterflies in haste,
  • Also learned to grow gourds by the shade of mulberry trees, returning home with a full meal after dusk, not shedding my cloak to lie beneath the moonlight.
  • As I grew older, I hoped to be inscribed on the gold list, to have a beautiful woman accompany me, to have endless wealth, to rise continuously, to have a full table of guests, to have nightly singing and dancing.
  • When old, I wanted health and longevity, welcome childhood servants, young children waiting at the door, a chessboard, a confidant, a bottle of wine, a courtyard, enjoying family harmony.

You see people rushing about in a hurry, only seeking a few taels of broken silver. Yet, this broken silver, can it dispel all kinds of melancholy in the world?

  • Half the people are still struggling to make ends meet, where do they have time to pursue meaning?
  • In fact, human life is just an experience, like plants, the sun and moon – experiencing the cycle of desire.
  • If you don’t understand it, you’ll feel like a gnat in the vast universe, a grain of sand on the Yangtze River. When you do understand, you can be happy with what you encounter, enjoy what you have temporarily, find contentment in yourself, and live joyfully until old age.
  • You can pursue wealth and fame, or poetry, wine, flowers, and tea. You can pursue the clear breeze on the river or the bright moon in the mountains.
  • But don’t overly concern yourself with the results; they will all eventually pass away.
  • After a lifetime of hardship, when you arrive in this world, try to experience the joys and sorrows, birth, old age, sickness, and death.
  • I really like this quote from The Tale of the Sea Stallion – A Princess’s Love.

I greatly enjoyed The Analects of Zan Gong and Romance of the Three Kingdoms.

Reflecting on the rise of past generations, one feels a sense of longing; if only one could truly connect with them, never lamenting their fate, unable to explain it within one’s heart. One knows that dying as one’s life is illusory, and the tragedy of Zang and Peng is merely fabricated. When posterity looks upon us now, we are like we are now looking upon them. Alas!

item.title: lost-and-confused
item.description:
• Often, at some stage in life, people find themselves lost in a haze, unsure of what they truly want. Amidst the mundane routines of work, they gradually lose their pursuit of meaning and purpose. Looking back to when I first graduated, my heart was full of fervent aspirations – I wouldn’t hesitate to say that I longed to write code, to create brilliant, eye-catching code. However, as I’ve worked for so long, I’ve had more exposure to business-level affairs, which has largely benefited from the advantages brought about by industry development.

In terms of my life philosophy, I haven’t yet incorporated marriage and having children, or establishing a family, into my thinking. My mind is almost empty, simply focused on enjoying the present moment. Whenever weekends arrive, I enjoy quietly playing games, often spending an entire day at home, immersed in my own little world.

Buying a House

Two years ago, I was full of enthusiasm, planning to save diligently and buy my own property. I meticulously budgeted every day towards this goal. However, as housing prices continued to skyrocket, my anxiety and resentment gradually turned into numbness, leading me to feel that even if I bought a house, it would simply be a heavy burden on my shoulders. Consequently, I abandoned this idea.

Saving Money

Initially, saving money was about achieving some small goals, such as building a high-performance desktop computer, purchasing a long-desired camera, or taking an impromptu trip. However, now I approach saving with a more relaxed and “chill” attitude, no longer worrying too much about daily expenses – I indulge in things I want to eat and boldly try new and exciting things.

Returning Home

In the end, I realized that what I most longed for deep down was simply to go home. There wasn’t anything particularly to do, just to return to that familiar place and feel the warmth and tranquility of home.

item.title: Hong Kong Futures Basic Concepts
item.description:
As financial markets continue to evolve, investors have begun seeking more effective investment tools to enhance their investment returns. To meet investor demand, The Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited (HKEX) has launched a range of stock futures contracts, all of which represent stocks listed on its wholly-owned subsidiary, the Hong Kong Stock Exchange (HKEX), which boasts high trading volumes and active liquidity. Through investing in stock futures, investors can participate in the performance of individual companies while also benefiting from the short selling and leverage effects offered by the derivatives market.

Given that the underlying stocks represented by stock futures are typically leading companies within their respective industries, investors can strategically select to invest in those industry-specific futures if they believe a particular sector’s performance will outperform or underperform the overall stock market.

Basic Definition

A stock futures contract is an agreement to buy or sell a specified quantity of financial value (the contract size) equivalent to a specified number of shares (the underlying stock) at a predetermined price (the agreed-upon price) on a future, specified date.

All stock futures contracts are settled in cash and do not involve the physical delivery of shares upon expiration.

Contract Expiry

Upon contract expiry, the profit or loss amount is calculated as the difference between the agreed-upon price and the final settlement price multiplied by the contract multiplier, which will be deducted from the clearing member’s margin account.

The final settlement price refers to the official closing price of the stock reported by the Shanghai Stock Exchange on the last trading day.

If a futures investor wishes to close out their position before expiry, a short seller only needs to buy back one futures contract, while a long position holder must sell one futures contract.

Margin Deposit

In futures trading, both buyers and sellers are required to initially deposit a basic margin as collateral to fulfill the contract. After each daily settlement, the clearing organization calculates profits or losses for all open contracts based on the closing market price and uses this to deduct from the investor’s margin account. If unfavorable market conditions result in an investor incurring losses that cause their margin to fall below the specified level, the exchange will require the investor to top up their margin within a designated timeframe to maintain it at the original basic margin level (i.e., to cover).

Advantages

  • Low Transaction Fees: Each stock futures contract is equivalent to thousands of shares, but brokerage commissions are determined by the number of contracts, making transaction costs relatively low in relation to contract value.
  • Easier Short Selling: Because investors can easily short stocks through futures contracts, they can profit during market declines by shorting stock futures.
  • Market Maker System: To ensure market liquidity, The Hong Kong Exchange & Clearing Limited (HKEX) requires market makers to simultaneously provide buy and sell prices within a specified range, maintaining circulation in the stock futures market.
  • Leverage Effect: Investors only need to pay a margin representing a small portion of the contract value when buying or selling stock futures contracts, making hedging and trading more cost-effective. - Reduce foreign investor’s currency risk: Stock futures contracts provide a way for overseas investors to invest in high-quality local stocks because buying and selling stock futures only requires paying a margin, rather than the full contract value, thereby significantly reducing the currency risk borne by overseas investors.
  • Trading through electronic trading systems: Stock futures contracts are traded using the Taiwan Futures Exchange’s electronic trading system. All orders are executed in the order of price and time, and immediate display of buy prices, sell prices, and transaction prices ensures maximum market transparency.

Advantages

  • Clearing companies provide performance guarantees: Stock futures contracts will be registered, settled, and guaranteed by HKFE Clearing Ltd (the clearing company), a wholly owned subsidiary of the Hong Kong Futures Exchange. Due to the clearing company being the counterparty for all open positions, there is no need for participants in the exchange to bear counterparty risk between themselves. However, the scope of this guarantee does not include the financial responsibility of the exchange participants towards their clients; investors should exercise caution and diligence when selecting a broker for buying and selling.

Market Making

Market participants or individual stock futures contracts may register as market makers on the exchange and simultaneously provide both buy and sell prices within the specified maximum spread. Exchange participants and their clients should note that individual stock futures contracts may not have a market maker registered to provide buy-sell spreads, and their trades will be based on market trading units. Investors should be aware that buying and selling stock futures without a registered market maker may involve liquidity risk, and caution should be exercised before entering the market.

Risks of Trading Stock Futures

Stock futures involve high risks. Losses arising from trading stock futures may exceed the initial margin paid at opening, potentially requiring you to pay additional margins within a short period. If unable to meet these payments, your position may be liquidated, and you will bear all resulting losses. Therefore, it is essential to fully understand the risks associated with trading stock futures and assess whether it’s suitable for you. Before engaging in transactions, consult with a broker or financial advisor to determine if futures and options contracts are appropriate based on your financial situation and investment objectives.

Adjusting Comments

When a listed company changes its capital structure through methods such as cash offers or stock dividends, the stock price will change at the time of net asset valuation or the effective date, and correspondingly, uncovered contracts may also be affected.

If other circumstances remain unchanged, the value held by shareholders’ portfolios will not change on the settlement day, but this is different for buyers or holders of stock futures. Unless the futures contract is appropriately adjusted. If the initial pricing remains unchanged and the contract multiplier remains constant, the adjustment of the stock price will unfairly and unjustly affect the value of the stock futures holding.

When the clearinghouse determines the adjustment ratio, it does so based on maintaining the fair value of the futures contracts and only makes adjustments when there are significant changes.

item.title: Capital Monopoly and the Demise of the Online Education Industry
item.description:
Recent two trading days have seen a significant stock market decline, exposing newcomers to the risks of the market. China is about to enter an aging demographic phase, and birth rates are dismal, with the reduction exceeding the estimates of relevant experts, hindering industries that obstruct declining birth rates; the Party will take decisive action.

Student Burden Reduction

Those of us born in the 1990s didn’t have as many extracurricular classes, tutoring programs, or the freedom to run wild after school. This was primarily due to our families’ limited resources, and secondarily because tutoring companies hadn’t yet established a strong brand reputation, making it difficult for parents to trust them. Twenty years have passed since then, and starting in 2019, the K12 education capitalization trend emerged, with companies like猿辅导 (Yuancuizou – literally “Monkey Tutoring”) appearing as online tutoring platforms based on code. With the backing of capital, these companies created various high-end tutoring programs by concentrating excellent resources. Despite exorbitant fees, parents’ enthusiasm remained undeterred. > During the urbanization process, many parents have relied on education as a path to escape from humble backgrounds and achieve a social class leap. As wage laborers themselves, they lack sufficient time to care for their children, adding to their own intense competition and reluctance to see their children fall behind peers. Given the difficulty of rising above one’s origins (“noble offspring”) in traditional Chinese society, and the limited options for maintaining or advancing one’s social class without a suitable education, ordinary families find it difficult to sustain their current status or make another upward leap. Enrolling children in vocational schools is seen as an unacceptable slide down the social ladder – a perspective largely held by parents within the current societal environment.

Reducing Student Burden

Let’s revisit the reasons behind extracurricular tutoring and why parents seek it out. Textbook knowledge and example questions are straightforward – many students can understand them easily. However, most subjects cover broad concepts superficially without delving deeply into them. The talent selection mechanism requires differentiation, which leads to a contradiction: exam questions based solely on textbook knowledge cannot effectively filter candidates. This necessitates horizontal and vertical expansion of knowledge. These areas are aspects that teachers simply cannot cover in the classroom, creating the fertile ground for extracurricular tutoring to flourish. The document contains a large amount of content, with thirty detailed regulations covering multiple aspects. The document outline summary:

  • Comprehensively reduce the workload and duration for students, alleviating excessive academic burdens.
  • Enhance the level of after-school services offered by schools to meet diverse student needs.
  • Maintain strict governance, comprehensively regulate external training activities.
  • Significantly improve educational teaching quality to ensure students master and excel in their studies within the school environment.
  • Strengthen supporting governance and enhance support capabilities.
  • Carefully organize and implement the measures to achieve tangible results. ## Reducing Student Burden

However, most subjects cover broad concepts superficially without delving deeply into them. The talent selection mechanism requires differentiation, which leads to a contradiction: exam questions based solely on textbook knowledge cannot effectively filter candidates. This necessitates horizontal and vertical expansion of knowledge. These areas are aspects that teachers simply cannot cover in the classroom, creating the fertile ground for extracurricular tutoring to flourish.

Elite Education

There’s also a phenomenon in the education sector – the increasing prevalence of powerful private schools. Public schools are struggling to provide sufficient high-quality resources (leading to enclaves/gated communities). Various sized educational groups are attracting excellent teachers with high salaries, establishing quality learning environments, and gradually building their own brands, most notably: Hen Shuai Model. Old Home Company averages over 3000 RMB, powerful private primary schools charge between 9000 and 10000 RMB per year. Educational groups form a virtuous cycle – my tuition is expensive, but the teachers are excellent, students achieve good grades, I raise my tuition fees, and parents will still send their children there. Public school resources (teachers) are gradually being drawn to private schools, ultimately becoming synonymous with substandard education.

Algorithmic Optimization

There is data indicating that Meituan’s contracted delivery riders have approached 4 million, with approximately 400,000 active riders. Many people rely on this work to support their families and livelihoods. The relentless algorithmic pressure to minimize delivery times reduces individuals into measurable units, feeding them into algorithms for constant calculation and exploration of the delivery rider’s breaking point. Believing themselves clever, they violate human nature and serve capital. The market operates here, allowing everyone to play and enjoy sustainable play, rather than monopolizing, wielding privileges, capitalist gameplay, and the unrestrained, barbaric growth that will inevitably come to an end.

Stock Market Volatility

On July 24, 2021, education stocks represented by New Oriental performed a dramatic plunge, followed by Good Future in the pre-market session of the U.S. stock market, with stock prices halved.

China has gradually entered an aging society, and various social phenomena affecting family planning must be rectified; internet companies engaged in monopoly and overtime were fined, and the capital-concentrated education industry was also being scrutinized.

Stock Market Volatility

The education industry is not allowed to be capitalized on; a single vote directly rejected relevant industries from going public for financing, and there was wailing everywhere.

item.title: Fixed Income Funds / Bond Funds
item.description:
Those of us born in the 90s, we didn’t really feel the impact of the 2008 financial crisis – after all, we were young and hadn’t yet started to focus on finance. The roaring bull market of 2015 came with a lot of fanfare, and when it ended, it made quite a stir, ultimately requiring government intervention to stabilize the markets. Simultaneously, this brought the concept of “funds” into the view of ordinary people.

Ant Financial and Alipay

Alipay, as a natural traffic entry under Ant Financial, was born with the positioning of a payment tool. When purchasing funds, most people chose Alipay like WeChat did. Alipay successfully transformed fund sales into an ordinary shopping experience. Starting in 2019, with the small bull market, fund managers’ “warming up” recruitment, ultimately stemmed from the monetary loosening guided by the COVID-19 pandemic. Those who entered made money, those who didn’t enter were envious and rushed to join in. The scale of new funds broke through the hundred billion mark at an increasingly rapid pace, and a trillion-fund market was not far off, even in scenarios where “grandmothers” (older investors) started buying funds.

Prior to Ant Financial’s explosive rise as a code-based internet fund sales platform, ordinary people’s contact with fund sales was primarily through depositing money at banks, where the bank manager would enthusiastically introduce various investment products. The packaging of the internet, promotional pages guiding information, and exorbitant advertising fees paid by fund sales institutions completely detached Alipay’s fund advertisements from reason.

Normal bank fixed-term investment returns are 4%, P2P investments that were played wildly in recent years reached 8%, credit card repayment interest rates are 12%. Our protagonist, Alipay’s promoted funds of 150% and 250% are trending, making insiders happy. The market declines? Alipay is playing with fire. The advertised growth figures only show the three-year returns, while traditional fund companies only provide annualized average returns. Why don’t they dare to present the annual average returns separately? It’s not because it’s difficult to calculate – the answer is no, because unfavorable data doesn’t encourage customers to buy funds.

Fixed Income Investments

China hasn’t yet entered a negative interest rate era, making bank deposits and government bonds the most secure fixed-income products. Pure credit funds are also a good option. You can refer to the data published by local statistical bureaus to find China’s average wage levels. Here’s a simple scenario: with an asset size of 2 million (CNY), a yearly yield of 4% converted, the annual income would exceed most cities’ average wages.

Epilogue

This is largely based on my personal experiences, and there’s much more to say. If you want to learn more, I recommend reading a variety of economic books yourself – don’t blindly follow. For ordinary families, the core of financial planning is preservation, not chasing risky dreams of getting rich quick.

My uncle often says:

The right thing at the right time has the greatest value; study diligently when you’re studying, and earning a good degree is better than making pocket money by distributing flyers; work seriously when you first graduate, and your salary increases can bring you substantial returns; and when you start a family, learn to take care of your home.

Epilogue

Those interested can take a look at this speech transcript: “On Time,” you’ll need to read many books to find the answers – the text of the speech is available on our site.

item.title: Linux Setup JMeter Test Environment
item.description:
The author has a strong interest in hardware and used JMeter to conduct load testing, documenting the process of deploying JMeter, InfluxDB, and Grafana on CentOS 7. They shared installation and command usage for JMeter, InfluxDB’s features and Docker installation method, as well as simple deployment and configuration for Grafana. They summarized experience and references related to high-performance programming patterns.

Background

As widely known, I have a strong interest in hardware. While the test team was using JMeter to perform load tests and discovered that performance wasn’t improving, as a curious individual, I decisively took action to investigate how the company conducted its testing. There’s also a little story: at some point in the distant past, I had read a post on OpenChina detailing how to create more impressive-looking performance test graphs – having visualized TPS data during tests for the Windows version. Furthermore, what’s the use of setting up a web panel?

Thinking is one thing; actually trying it out reveals the truth. Don’t use GUI mode for load testing! Only for Test creation and Test debugging.

Background

Officially, it’s recommended to obtain test reports via the command line and display them with a GUI, which introduces data errors. I don’t have deep knowledge of JMeter – at least I found a reason to tinker with a Linux version console panel. The openchinese post’s core component deployment isn’t friendly; you need to follow their WeChat channel to download the required files, and as a millennial, of course I used Docker instead. Basically, my server is located domestically, and accessing the overseas source addresses is very slow – at least using an image service like Alibaba Cloud has a free acceleration.

Regarding the installation and deployment of docker, this will not be detailed here; please refer to previous articles for recommendations.

The following content focuses on two main areas: setting up the basic test environment components and a simple explanation of each component.

JMeter

Apache JMeter is a Java-based load testing tool developed by the Apache Software Foundation. It’s used to perform load testing on software, initially designed for web application testing but later expanded to other testing domains. It can be used to test static and dynamic resources such as static files, Java microservices, CGI scripts, Java objects, databases, FTP servers, etc. JMeter can simulate massive loads from various stress categories onto servers, networks, or objects to assess their strength and analyze overall performance. Furthermore, JMeter can perform functional/regression testing on applications by creating scripts with assertions to validate that your program returns the expected results. To maximize flexibility, JMeter allows the use of regular expressions to create assertions. Apache JMeter can be used to perform performance testing of static and dynamic resources (files, Servlets, Perl scripts, Java objects, databases and queries, FTP servers, etc.). It can be used to simulate heavy loads on servers, networks, or objects to test their strength or analyze overall performance under different stress types. You can use it for graphical analysis of performance metrics or for large concurrent load testing of your server/script/object.

JMeter Deployment on CentOS7

Install the JDK runtime environment, download the JMeter installation package, and configure environment variables.

JMeter Commands

Finally, it will be connected to the Grafana dashboard, and you don’t need to input the -l parameter; you can observe data in the web console.

InfluxDB

InfluxDB is an open-source distributed time series database written in Go. It requires no external dependencies. The database is now primarily used for storing large volumes of timestamped data, such as DevOps monitoring data, app metrics, IoT sensor data, and real-time analytics data.

InfluxDB Features

InfluxDB’s features can be summarized into the following 9 aspects:

  • Schema-less (Schemaless): Can accommodate an arbitrary number of columns;
  • Metric Retention Time Setting: Allows setting retention times for metrics;
  • Support for Time-Related Functions: Supports functions related to time (such as min, max, sum, count, mean, median, etc.) for convenient statistical analysis;
  • Storage Policy Support: Can be used for data deletion and modification (InfluxDB does not provide direct methods for deleting or modifying data);
  • Continuous Query Support: Automatically scheduled sets of queries that run continuously, combined with storage policies to reduce InfluxDB’s system footprint;
  • Native HTTP Support: Built-in HTTP API;
  • Support for SQL-like Syntax: Supports a syntax similar to SQL;
  • Support for Setting Data Replication Count in Clusters: Allows setting the number of replicas for data within clusters;
  • Support for Periodic Sampling of Data: Writes data to another measurement, facilitating granular data storage.

InfluxDB Docker Installation

docker exec -it influxdb /bin/bash to enter the container and execute commands, manually creating a database.

InfluxDB Database and User Creation

Create database: create database jmeter_t2 View databases: show databases Switch to database: use jmeter_t2 Create user: create user "admin" with password 'admin' with all privileges View users: show users

If the user permissions for admin are displayed as true, the database setup is complete.

Grafana

When writing test cases, it was found that the chart visualization effect is not really necessary; the tps data from the interface can be observed when executed from the command line. The primary goal is to understand the internal latency of the program.

A simple deployment of the Grafana console panel and importing a configuration file to connect with InfluxDB was performed.

The console supports filtering test results by tags, generally requiring only configuring one InfluxDB database:

  • Application Name
  • Test Case Name

Due to the sampling interval in the web version, the calculated TPS and related values are inconsistent with the JMeter aggregated report. Please refer to the following link: https://www.vinsguru.com/jmeter-real-time-results-influxdb-grafana/

The documentation also describes how to customize the listeners.

Epilogue

  • High-performance program patterns invariably are one-loop thread; any locks, enqueueing, and dequeueing will cause unnecessary performance loss.
  • The time spent on core business logic is greater than the time spent introducing other code; concurrency can effectively improve efficiency only when the core latency is sufficiently large; otherwise, it’s best to be cautious about introducing other code.

References

  • JMeter Series - JMeter + Grafana + InfluxDB Real-time Monitoring
  • InfluxDB Official Image
  • Grafana Official Image
  • JMeter Website
  • To Install Apache JMeter in CentOS7

item.title: us-china-trade-war
item.description:
Let’s start with some tangential points – the differences between Chinese-style socialism and capitalism, from the perspective of older generations who said that to get rich, you first needed to build roads. China’s infrastructure construction – these things are all funded by the state, whereas in a capitalist society, they would be contracted out. In remote areas, there’s no profit motive, so companies wouldn’t willingly take on those projects. There’s a lot of rambling going on here, and it’s starting to drift away from the current topic. Ordinary people might think trade wars don’t have much impact on their lives, but in reality, China’s high-end manufacturing has always been relatively weak. The IT industry I work in – memory, hard drives, CPUs, graphics cards – configuring a computer requires core components sourced from overseas factories. These parts account for 50% of the total cost, and the development of high-end manufacturing is essential. The collision between China and the United States is inevitable.

References

  • Trade War Between the US and China Starting in 2018
  • Made in China 2025

Wikipedia

2018-2020 China–United States trade war, often referred to as the “China–United States trade war” (English: China–United States trade war), or simply “US–China trade dispute,” “US–China trade friction,” “US–China trade conflict,” or “US-China trade war,” was a trade war between the People’s Republic of China and the United States of America.

The trade dispute originated when U.S. President Donald Trump signed a memorandum on March 22, 2018, claiming that “China is stealing American intellectual property and trade secrets,” and invoking Section 301 of the Trade Act of 1974 to impose tariffs on goods imported from China, covering a total value estimated at $600 billion. On July 6, 2018, the United States imposed additional tariffs of 25% on $340 billion worth of Chinese goods shipped to the U.S.

Wikipedia

The United States and China had reached an agreement in May 2018 to temporarily suspend the trade war, and issued a joint statement seeking reconciliation. However, the Office of the U.S. Trade Representative announced its first list of tariffs on Chinese goods shipped to the US on June 16th, raising the existing 10% tariff rate to 25%. The China Tariff Committee subsequently retaliated with equivalent measures, and the Ministry of Commerce of China also restarted anti-dumping investigations into various U.S.-bound products. On July 6th, the Trump administration formally imposed a 25% customs duty on $34 billion worth of Chinese goods shipped to the US from the first list of tariffs, marking the formal implementation of Trump’s trade policy towards China (the remaining $16 billion in goods were subsequently subject to a 25% tariff on August 23rd). The Ministry of Commerce of China stated afterward, “The United States has violated WTO rules and launched what is now the largest trade war in economic history.” According to the General Administration of Customs of China, the Chinese side immediately implemented counter-measures following the implementation of US tariffs.

On December 1st, during the G20 Buenos Aires Summit, leaders Xi Jinping and Donald Trump reached an agreement to hold a 90-day negotiation and suspend new trade measures during that period. After the deadline of March 1st, 2019 expired, the US side announced significant progress and extended the suspension of new trade measures.

Wikipedia

May 5, 2019, U.S. President Donald Trump announced the imposition of a 25% tariff on approximately $200 billion in Chinese goods, totaling $250 billion, as part of a trade war. The measure took effect on June 1st. On May 13th, China’s Tariff Policy Commission announced that starting June 1st, it would increase tariffs on some imported goods originating in the United States valued at $60 billion to a range of 5% to 25%. On June 1st, the U.S. Trade Representative’s Office announced a postponement of the imposition of a 25% tariff on U.S. products until June 15th. China’s Tariff Policy Commission stated that China’s retaliatory tariffs would take effect as scheduled on June 1st.

June 29th, the leaders Xi Jinping and Trump held talks at the G20 Osaka Summit, agreeing to resume economic negotiations. The United States agreed not to impose new tariffs on Chinese products.

Wikipedia

On August 1st, due to the Trump administration’s dissatisfaction with China’s purchasing process of American agricultural products, Trump announced on Twitter that starting September 1st, 2019, tariffs of 10% would be imposed on all US goods imported from China worth $300 billion. On August 5th, the Renminbi exchange rate against the dollar fell below the 7-yuan mark. The same day, the U.S. Treasury Department announced that it was designating China as a currency manipulator. Subsequently, the Chinese government announced a suspension of purchases of American agricultural products and on August 24th announced tariffs of 10% or 5% on approximately $750 billion worth of US goods, and restored tariffs on U.S. automobiles and their parts; while the U.S. increased the tariff rate on its $300 billion Chinese goods to 15%, and the current $250 billion Chinese goods to 25% as a countermeasure, but it was subsequently shelved.

On January 16th, 2020, China and the United States signed a Phase One trade agreement.

item.title: Building PCs
item.description:
The author has long had an interest in building computers from a young age, and began to delve into hardware assembly after university. They recommended websites for comparing hardware performance and offered purchasing suggestions, including CPU, solid-state drives, hard disk drives, and memory frequencies. They also shared their experience and advice regarding hardware selection and important considerations.

Wonder – Unspeakable

Ever since I was young, I’d dreamed of building my own computer, but unfortunately, economic conditions didn’t allow it. Finally, after a lot of hard work, I managed to get to university, and I configured a laptop for portability. If I had to pinpoint the exact time when I started thinking about assembling computers, it would be when I began browsing the library in my hometown. After all, it was a sizable city-level library, with not only an electronic reading room (which I never actually visited – supposedly you were charged by the hour), but also a magazine reading room, where I discovered magazines like Popular Science and PC Magazine. For someone who had limited exposure to computers, these were practically divine科普资料 (scientific explanation/learning materials). - When I read about players tackling dungeons, I started thinking about getting my own computer and going to pull monsters myself as the main damage dealer. Seeing the use of black technology, I fantasized about following the instructions in the book and achieving the described effect (regarding the use of hacking tools). Although my high school studies were heavy, with my limited understanding at the time, reading and playing were both necessary – it was a truly innocent and carefree experience. I would make an excuse to go to the library to read, and when nothing else to do, I’d carry a small bag and walk there; the city wasn’t that big, so I usually walked to the library.

  • When I got there, I enjoyed the air conditioning while reading novels, comics, and game magazines, occasionally even delving into more serious books.
  • It’s easy for older people to forget things, and the initial spark of the library experience wasn’t a surprise. Years later, I couldn’t remember the computer my relatives had assembled during their time – I didn’t know what it was used for.

Wonder – Unspeakable

Upon entering junior high school, the school offered introductory computer training, and later I transferred schools, where I also gained some exposure to concepts in computer competitions. After reaching high school, I qualified for NOIP once. Speaking of which, we must mention the power of our alumni; the high school’s computer building was donated by alumni and included a computer teaching room plus a library. Back then, it was also the initial wave of China’s internet boom. School leaders supported participation in computer competitions as well, considering that several senior classmates had been admitted to key universities through computer science.

I have never reflected on my relationship with computers like this before. It’s no wonder that after graduating, I resolutely switched from automation to the computer industry – the seed had already been planted, and it was simply a matter of an insider not realizing it. Having encountered many things from a young age, I thought I was very skilled, but in reality, I only understood the superficial aspects; my biggest advantage was the initial passion.

Hardware Assembly

Browse sites like Carda, Chiphell, and Zhihu’s computer assembly forums to get a newbie relatively simple list of components they would need for their own machine. After 2019, when purchasing CPUs with limited financial resources, AMD is the preferred choice for higher performance.

I recommend a commonly used hardware performance comparison website: https://cpu.userbenchmark.com/. For pricing, you can compare it to the US versions available on Xianyu (a Chinese online marketplace). True experts can go to Xianyu to find secondhand items, which can be significantly cheaper. If you’re not very familiar with this, I don’t recommend buying from Xianyu; I purchased fake memory, although I haven’t found any issues using it so far, and I’m not entirely sure about its specifications – the model and parameters don’t match at all.

SN550 VS SN750

The difference between the SN550 1TB and the SN750 1TB is that they consistently read and write slower by a factor of two – one reads at 850MB, while the other reads at 1.6GB. However, for everyday use, there’s no noticeable difference because both support 4K equally. Of course, I’m referring to the 1TB capacity SN550; speeds are significantly slower in sequential read/write operations for the 500G and 250G versions. In my opinion, if you’re not a spendthrift, buying the SN550 is sufficient – my main reason for not purchasing it wasn’t its sequential read/write speed, but rather that it only comes in a 1TB capacity, while the SN750 offers 2TB. For me, considering I don’t want to expand further, my motherboard’s M.2 NVMe interface is more valuable than these SSD differences.

Based on consensus from online users, purchasing a conversion board – such as the B150 motherboard – can also support M.2 SSDs.

Hard Disk Drive Selection

Currently, the prices of hard disk drives are relatively stable. For users with large storage needs, it is necessary to select a suitable mechanical hard drive. We recommend enterprise-grade hard drives for users who frequently download resources. Common ones include:

  • Western Blue Discs
  • Seagate Exos

Large capacity mechanical hard drives should be partitioned, and frequent download operations should be fixed on a specific partition. If bad sectors appear later, they can be concentrated in one partition, and the current partition can be discarded, which can effectively extend the lifespan of the mechanical hard drive.

Seagate series official introduction

Memory Frequency

From a daily usage perspective, frequency doesn’t have a significant impact on performance.

Memory timings (also known as RAM timings) are four parameters that describe the performance of Synchronous Dynamic Random Access Memory (SDRAM): CL, TRCD, TRP, andTRAS, measured in clock cycles. They are typically written as four numbers separated by hyphens, such as 7-8-8-24. The fourth parameter (RAS) is often omitted, and sometimes a fifth parameter is added: Command rate (command rate), usually 2T or 1T, also written as 2N or 1N. These parameters specify the latency (delay time) that affects the speed of random access memory. Lower numbers generally indicate better performance. The final determining element for system performance is the actual latency time, typically measured in nanoseconds. When converting memory timing to actual latency, it’s crucial to note that it’s measured in clock cycles. Without knowing the clock cycle time, you cannot determine if one set of numbers is faster than another.

Memory Frequency

For example, the clock frequency of DDR3-2000 memory is 1000 MHz, with a clock cycle of 1 ns. Based on this 1 ns clock, a CL7 value gives an absolute latency of 7 ns. A faster DDR3-2666 (clocking at 1333 MHz, with each cycle 0.75 ns) might use a larger CL9 to produce a shorter absolute latency of 6.75 ns. Modern DIMMs include a Serial Presence Detect (SPD) ROM chip containing recommended memory timings for auto-configuration. The PC’s BIOS may allow users to adjust timings to improve performance (with the risk of instability), or in some cases, increase stability (such as using suggested timings). Note: Memory bandwidth is measured as throughput and is typically limited by transfer rate rather than latency. By interleaving multiple internal banks of SDRAM, it’s possible to transmit data at peak rates continuously. - This may increase bandwidth at the cost of increased latency. Specifically, each new generation of DDR memory has a higher transfer rate but with no significant change in absolute latency, particularly for the initial batches of new products from the market, which often exhibit longer delays than previous generations.

  • Even with increased memory latency, increasing memory bandwidth can improve the performance of multi-processor or multi-threaded computer systems. Higher bandwidth will also boost the performance of integrated graphics cards that do not have dedicated video memory.

  • Memory Timing Parameter Explanation

References

  • Memory Time Series Parameter Explanation

item.title: Website Acceleration and Domain Settings
item.description:
Due to slow access to GitHub Pages from within the country, the author applied for a personal domain and purchased CDN acceleration services from a domestic cloud host provider. During configuration, the author encountered an issue where the www subdomain could not be accessed, which was ultimately resolved by deleting the generic domain DNS record and setting up a second-level domain separately. The author also shared the principles and configuration experience of CDN acceleration, as well as attempts and lessons learned using Nginx reverse proxy.

Background

The website is hosted on GitHub Pages, and due to some well-known reasons, accessing GitHub Pages internally can be slow. Therefore, I applied for a personal domain name and purchased CDN acceleration services from a domestic cloud host provider. When configuring the acceleration service, I thought about my development machine, which deployed Docker, frp, k8s, and other services – all of these had accompanying dashboards. Following the principle of not wasting anything, I configured several reverse proxies, all with second-level domain names.

When I was happily using the second-level domain names, I suddenly discovered that the www subdomain could no longer be accessed. In Aliyun, I configured DNS to resolve both www.xiangtianlong.com and xiangtianlong.com, and before enabling CDN acceleration, both domains were working normally. When configuring CDN acceleration, due to a large number of second-level domains, we enabled wildcard domain rules and unified routing them to the development machine. As a result, the ‘www’ second-level domain also went down – yes, you read that right, the ‘www’ prefix is indeed a second-level domain. The actual website is deployed on GitHub Pages, and the development machine has no cached website information.

As for why the site wasn’t deployed to the development machine, it was because it was a static blog, paired with GitHub’s provided action that automatically integrates publishing – seriously delicious!

Domain

Non-professional web development, the understanding of domains does not involve SEO or cross-origin issues. As a blog site, a bare domain easily highlights the blogger’s site, such as myself who uses Chinese Pinyin as my domain name, and given that mobile access is now more prevalent, it’s preferable to input fewer characters.

Keyboard shortcuts can be used on desktop to avoid entering “www” and “com”.

CDN

I’ve used both Alibaba Cloud and Tencent Cloud, and it’s easy for newcomers to get started. Tencent Cloud also has separate video explanations of the related concepts. The principle of CDN acceleration is similar to that of a JD.com warehouse: new products are shipped in advance to warehouses across China, and when delivery requests are triggered, they are distributed locally.

Origin Address: The address where the original website resources are stored.

Cache file settings: Using F12 in your browser’s developer console to analyze static and dynamic resources.

  • All 0 days validity
  • .php;.jsp;.asp;.aspx 0 days validity
  • .jpg;.png;.js;.css;.woff2 1 day validity

Tencent Cloud configuration rules:

  • You can configure up to 10 cache expiration rules.
  • The priority of multiple cache expiration rules is bottom-first.
  • Cache expiration time can be set up to a maximum of 365 days.

Miserable Confession

I had never used Nginx before, assuming I could figure out reverse proxy configuration by simply searching for website information. The result was quite chaotic; I struggled for half a day without even getting a 302 redirect to work. So, I decided to take a brute-force approach – deleting wildcard domain resolution patterns in DNS and setting up individual second-level domains. Suddenly, I noticed that Alibaba Cloud DNS had a “Display URL Redirect” feature, which worked perfectly as a 302 redirect.

After setting the first second-level domain normally, when I tried to set the second one, it didn’t work, and I almost lost my mind. I waited for a while, and then it suddenly started working – apparently, Alibaba Cloud DNS sometimes has hiccups with its DNS propagation.

References

  • Why are more and more website domain names not prefixed with “www”?
  • What’s the difference between domains with and without “www”?
  • Docker Nginx Reverse Proxy Setup

item.title: Blog IDE Environment and Ramblings
item.description:
This article introduces the basic concepts of Markdown and its applications in various software, recommends using VSCode as an IDE, and lists recommended plugins. The author shares their experience switching from Hexo to Hugo, emphasizing Hugo’s flexibility and customization capabilities. Finally, it provides some suggestions for quickly getting started with new technologies and shares a trick for resolving the issue of Hugo theme styles not updating.

Introduction

Markdown

A lightweight markup language that allows people to write documents in an easy-to-read and -write plain text format.

Markdown

Detailed Markdown syntax will not be elaborated upon in this document. We recommend an ebook, click here. Many software applications on the market now support MD as a writing format. The csdn blog system has launched an online editor that supports MD syntax; the first time you use it, there is a default introduction article about MD syntax, which I think is quite good. iNotes added support for MD notes in 2018, with various MD markers in the shortcut bar, and it’s almost as easy to use as editing a regular article. The overall interaction process is friendly to beginners.

IDE Recommendations

When writing this article, it’s already 2020 – you’ve undoubtedly heard of VS Code, after all, anyone thinking about using Git Page to build a blog system is an industry professional. In the early years, Sublime and Atom were also good choices. With two years of promotion from the open-source community, VS Code has developed rapidly and has gradually become the preferred choice for newcomers.

The relationship between Microsoft’s giant and the open-source community has successfully transitioned into a honeymoon phase: embracing open source. Our company has also actively introduced the Java ecosystem in recent two years, meaning that in business development, Java’s ecosystem is currently very fragrant domestically.

VS Code Plugin Recommendations

All plugins have their own Readme files, introducing basic usage, core functions, and some authors even provide dynamic effect demonstration images. Paste Image, combined with Hugo’s image plugin method, is very convenient for importing images.

Don’t remember the shortcuts, open the VS Code shortcut management menu, search for “md”, read it several times; review it again to look at the plugin usage instructions.

Hugo

I switched from Hexo to Hugo, as I love tinkering – it’s just my nature! Ultimately, I couldn’t resist the urge to quietly write articles.

  1. Hugo supports placing images and Markdown documents in a single folder.
  2. The Academic theme supports various article styles in its design.
  3. Various convenient customization extensions.

academic

The default website is exampleSite, and menu introduction uses the #component method, it’s recommended to use url.

The URL pattern allows navigation links to jump to a single page instead of scrolling on the homepage – this is purely a matter of personal preference.

  • Styles: Notebooks, Speeches, eBooks
  • Flexibility: Customization of overall style and custom CSS styles.

This theme’s Chinese support isn’t very complete; primarily from a visual perspective, the font sizes don’t align well with Chinese reading habits. The Hexo development team is largely comprised of Chinese developers, which is an advantage over Hugo in this regard. However, it’s rewarding to do things yourself and customize – browser element auditing. When you locate an element, to find out the CSS style name you need to modify, click Insert Style Rule Below on the sidebar, even with nested CSS layers, you can easily get the node name.

  • [Introduce custom.css](https://sourcethemes.

academic

  • Built-in syntax highlighting settings, official link

Conclusion

The kids are complaining again, saying you talk in such a vague and unclear way, without mentioning any details.

What I want to say is that with these things, you have enough to work with:

  • Official Manuals
  • Plugin Documentation

When quickly getting started with new technologies, it’s recommended to first read the official website documentation, scanning through – not necessarily reading it cover to cover, but at least having a general idea. Search engine results may not always be consistent with the latest version and could potentially mislead you. Similarly, when reviewing a new book, start by looking at the table of contents to understand what the author intends to discuss; sometimes, reading the introduction first is beneficial, especially with translated foreign books where the translator’s preface often covers the core content of the book.

Easter Eggs

Switching the Hugo Academic built-in style and theme, publishing to the site, and accessing it did not result in a change of style. A clever teammate already figured this out – clearing the local browser cache resolved the issue. It was then that I, with my ingenuity, used Developer Mode (F12), switched to network, checked “disable cache,” refreshed, and voila!

item.title: Automatic System Switchover
item.description:
Use GitHub Actions to automatically deploy your Hugo blog to GitHub Pages and Gitee.

Background Introduction

Yesterday while updating the blog, I discovered that the travis service was unavailable. Upon checking the travis webpage, I noticed the progress was stuck during source code retrieval, and a flash of inspiration hit me – I thought about GitHub’s previously launched action service.

At the time, I was quite busy, and also needed to apply to use action. Now that it has officially gone live, I have some free time over the weekend and wanted to try out a new toy?

Official documentation can be found by entering the website yourself; this article will not do much more copying and pasting. If you’ve used Kubernetes before, you’ll find that the action YAML file configuration is very similar.

Regarding introductory tutorials or Chinese introduction materials, I recommend searching for 阮一峰’s blog. There are two articles – the first introduces the basic syntax, and the second provides a practical case study.

#### Content

Knowledge Points Needed
- GitHub Secrets
- Action Syntax
The core job uses existing components to complete the task, and pushing to the domestic Gitee is implemented using commands. This command approach is quite brute force, as it performs forceful pushes, inheriting the logic used with Travis.

Epilogue

Based on the actions provided by the official market, currently there are quite a few supported playstyles. After building a Docker image, it’s no longer dependent on services offered by Docker Hub.

Reviewing the Hugo issues, using GitHub Actions to automatically deploy Git Pages results in the final published website needing to be on the master branch. If deployed from another branch, the settings interface will prompt an error indicating that the deployed webpage has syntax problems.

This is simply because Hugo’s source files are located on the master branch, and GitHub treats it as the Jelly blog’s source code for detection, unable to check and resolve any errors resulting in the error message.

The solution is straightforward: move Hugo source files to another branch and publish static files to the master branch.

item.title: The future of China will undoubtedly be a China of good elders and good old people.
item.description:
I hope that twenty years from now, I’ll be a cute old man, spending time with a cute old woman. I don’t seek great wealth or status; just to be healthy and strong enough to travel and explore.

Video Transcript

Go to Youku Search, and no further links will be provided.

Transcript

I said that in 10 years, I’d be a charming old man, and I would work hard to become a charming old man. The future of China will definitely have good old men and women. Even if I’m 60 in 10 years, I’ll be the youngest in the world’s third-rate society.

To be honest, if everyone sees 50-year-old Chinese men with this physique, it would be pretty impressive. But behind this physique is a saying I believe: the more disciplined you are, the freer you become! When the rain stops, I want to go running; tomorrow afternoon I’ll play soccer. At 50 years old, I can still play big games – it’s not a joke, and I often play with professionals. But what’s behind all of this? “Behind it is autonomy. The remaining days I spend running, and people might find that very monotonous. The more disciplined you are, the freer you become. Because of my discipline, I can run freely, never listening to music – because I feel my own breath is the most beautiful music while running.”

Transcript

Additionally, I rarely run on the treadmill. Also, many people in Beijing experience smog as severe as that, so I run five days a week, with two days dedicated to the smog. And unlike others, I jokingly say it’s probably because I never stop. Each month, I record my runs in my journal – drawing one day for every day of experience, at least 18 days per month. When running, they just flash by; I don’t even wear glasses while running, but more importantly, I still kick a ball every week. My graduate students’ last lecture was always held at our home—on the theme of “fun.” I find fun incredibly important, and I never engage with people who lack joy or hobbies.

  • When I first started teaching a few years ago, one of my graduate students was featured in China News Weekly. We had a special issue called “Zhi” (致 – meaning “letter to”), and ten years later, when my student graduated each year, the final assignment he would complete was writing an article for me ten years down the line. I’d keep it, and then I’d gradually develop it with them as they progressed, including writing one myself at 50 for those turning 60 – something I never imagined happening so far away, beyond the map. But suddenly, it became my next stop: writing to 20-year-olds for 30-year-olds. That was a love letter written in spring, but my 50-year-old piece for 60 was more like summer’s farewell whispered to autumn – a private monologue. Now, I’m writing to them ten years later, slowly constructing it from all over the world, as if crafting it for their own bed, a meal, and the presence of their family. This feels entirely natural.

Transcript

But what kind of person will I be at 60 years old? My topic is very clear: In a pleasant introduction, this article is long. I say that in 10 years, I will be a lovable old man, and I want to work hard to become a lovable old man. China wanting to be lovable isn’t just about having more like-minded citizens who become citizens, not just ordinary young people, energetic young people who understand the rules, young people who will make a good China in the future. Currently, over 60 million people in China have already exceeded 2.3 billion, and it will definitely exceed three billion within 10 years. That means that solely based on the population of those over 60, China could be among the top five or even third countries in the world. Think about how frightening that is!

I don’t feel that way myself. - I don’t know if everyone has seen the online table today listing the average lifespans of all provinces and municipalities in China.
